roleset.name: give a warning
roleset.note: WARN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'warn' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'advise'. Member of Vncls advise-37.9-1. (from warn.01-v)
WARNING-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'warn.01'. Vn class advise-37.9-1. No Fn class. Framed by Katie. (from warning.01-n)

roles.note: Args 1 and 2 are reversed from 'advise' but follow the pattern of'say' etc. (from warn.01-v)

example.name: just the warning
example.text: [Two antitrust agencies may face further cutbacks because of a complicated new funding device,]-1 some Democrats in Congress are warning *trace*-1.

example.name: with entity warned
example.text: The issue has come to a boil in Newark, N.J., where federal prosecutors have warned lawyers for Eddie Antar that if the founder and former chairman of Crazy Eddie Inc. is indicted, the government may move to seize the money that Mr. Antar is using to pay legal fees.
example.arg: that if the founder and former chairman of Crazy Eddie Inc. is indicted, the government may move to seize the money that Mr. Antar is using to pay legal fees

example.name: warning as PP
example.text: Bay Financial Corp., Boston, which *trace* has been reporting big losses and warning of a possible bankruptcy-law filing, said it was sued by a holder.

example.name: warning as infinitive
example.text: Mr. Thompson projected that [Anheuser]-1's statement of intent could simply be a means of *trace*-1 warning competitors to ease up on price-cutting or face a costly and fruitless battle.
example.arg: to ease up on price-cutting or face a costly and fruitless battle

example.name: With an about phrase as arg 1
example.text: A warning to American tourists about a rogue elephant charging visitors
example.arg: about a rogue elephant charging visitors

example.name: Arg 1 as actual thing your warned about
Arg 0
example.text: war hero Dwight Eisenhower's suprising warning about the influence of the pentagon
example.arg: about the influence of the pentagon
